English: Road to Morton
Northernmost point
BAZA TO YURI, OUR FORCES ARE READY. LEAD THEM TO MORTON AND BEYOND, COMRADE KUKUSHKIN. THE OPERATION IS FULLY IN YOUR HANDS. BAZA OUT.
FOXTROT TO YURI, WE'RE RIGHT BEHIND YOU. WE SHALL FOLLOW YOUR LEAD! OUT.
YURI TO ALL UNITS, I COMMENCE THE OPERATION. ON ME, COMRADES! WE SHALL STRIKE FAST AND WE SHALL STRIKE HARD! THE RUSSIAN BEAR NEVER SLEEPS! ONWARDS!
MORTON IS IN OUR SIGHTS! ON ME, COMRADES, FORWARD! FOR THE MOTHERLAND!
YURI TO ALL UNITS, THE VILLAGE IS OURS! SEND IN THE INFANTRY. OVER.

BAZA TO YURI, WELL DONE. BE CAREFUL, THE ENEMY CONCETRATES HIS FORCES IN THE VALLEY UP AHEAD. INTEL SUGGESTS THERE IS A MASSIVE TANK FORCE WAITING FOR YOU. WE DON'T HAVE ANY ADDITIONAL SUPPORT FOR YOU, THIS WILL BE STRICTLY A TANK BATTLE. MAKE US PROUD, COMRADE! BAZA OUT.
YOU HEARD HIM, COMRADES. REGROUP AND GET READY FOR THE FIGHT OF YOUR LIVES! FOLLOW ME!
TATYANA TO YURI, WE'VE TRAVERSED THE WHOLE VALLEY AND THERE ARE NO SIGNS OF THE ENEMY. WHERE ARE THEY?
WATCH OUT! IT'S A TRAP! EVERYONE, DEFEND YOURSELVES!
YURI TO BAZA, WE DESTROYED THE ENEMY ARMOUR! IT WAS A HARD FOUGHT BATTLE, BUT THE RUSSIAN BEAR PREVAILED! WE'RE MOVING OUT TO SEIZE LEVIE. OUT.
BAZA TO YURI, EXTRAORDINARY WORK, COMRADE. LEVIE SHOULD NOT BE AN ISSUE, MOST OF THE ENEMY FORCES SHOULD BE RETREATING TO THE SOUTH. REACH THE VILLAGE TO SEAL OUR VICTORY. BAZA OUT.

YURI TO ALL UNITS, WE REACHED LEVIE. THE ENEMY HAS RETREATED. WE BESTED THEIR ARMOURED FORCES AND SHOWED THEM THE EXTENT OF THE SOVIET MIGHT! MOTHER RUSSIA IS PROUD ON YOU ALL, COMRADES! WELL DONE. OUT.
Enemy Tanks
Soviet Forces
Minefield
SEIZE MORTON
BATTLE THE ENEMY TANKS
REACH LEVIE
